loans.use: To invest in her cosmetics business by purchasing more Avon and Jessica products.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma C. Quicana, a member of FINCA Perú in the community bank, Lila, is a single mom living in Ayacucho with her two children aged 16 and 14. To support her family Norma sells fruit at a busy market in Ayacucho. From her home, she also sells guinea pig (a traditional Ayacuchan dish) and pork.

Norma is requesting a loan to purchase more products to sell including more pork, guinea pigs, bananas, oranges, mandarins and apples. She dreams of being able to pay for her wedding and to purchase a store in Ayacucho where she will be able to sell her products.

loans.use: To purchase more products to sell including more pork, guinea pigs, bananas, oranges, mandarins and apples.

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida L. L., who lives in Ayacucho, Peru with her husband and their three-year-old son, is a member of the community bank, Perla. Every week Aida travels to the rainforest to gather fruits to sell on a street corner in Ayacucho, usually working from 4 a.m. to 7 a.m. everyday.

She is requesting a loan of $675 to invest in her business through the purchase of pineapples, papayas, oranges, bananas and mandarins. She is currently saving to buy a house and to be able to provide an education to her son. She dreams of owning her own mini-market.

loans.use: To purchase pineapples, papayas, oranges, bananas and mandarins for her business.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.es: Lucy es agricultora y trabaja en su pequeña chacrita de platanales, a la par labora junto a su esposo en una ascienda alejada de su hogar, donde se ocupa de cuidar los productos agrícolas y su esposo es el capataz. Ambos realizan su trabajo de la mejor manera y son las personas más trabajadoras de su zona.Gracias a este trabajo, puede solventar los gastos de sus 4 hijos, demás tuvo que superar un problema con su hija, cuando esta sufrió un desengaño y fue abandonada con un niño en los brazos, a quien ayudó y acogió nuevamente en su hogar. Sumado a esto, su casa tuvo que ser derrumbada ya que las estructuras tenían deficiencias y era muy insegura, ahora desea poder construir su casa nuevamente, donde puedan vivir toda su familia de manera segura.Para ello trabaja muy duramente y desea que le podamos ayudar con una suma de dinero para que pueda invertir en cultivos de plátano, y prontamente conseguir juntar lo necesario para la construcción de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Lucy is a farmer and works on her small banana plantation. Usually she works alongside her husband in an area far away from their home, where she sees to the care of the products and her husband is the foreman. Both carry out their work diligently and are some of the most hard-working people in the area. Thanks to this work, they can afford to provide for their four children and were able to overcome when their daughter was abandoned with a baby, taking them in and welcoming them back into their home. In addition to this, their home had to be demolished because it had structural deficiencies and was very unsafe. Now they want to be able to build a new home where their whole family could live safe and sound. For this, they work arduously and ask for our help with some money they can invest in cultivating bananas so they soon will have the necessary means to build their home.

Translated from Spanish by Marty Greenstein, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase banana production to earn more money to put toward building a home

loans.name: Janet

texts.es: Desde pequeña Janet se dedicó al cultivo de café, actividad que requiere de gran inversión y cuidado, esta tarea no es difícil para ella, ya que tiene mucha experiencia.La encontramos trabajando haciendo secar el café en el patio de su casa, para que prontamente pueda ser vendido por los comerciantes que visitan su comunidad o ser llevada a la ciudad de La Merced.Sin embargo, Janet tiene grandes necesidades dentro de su hogar, por las cuales desea incrementar su producción, adquirir mayores plantaciones de café y si fuera posible un terreno extra para aumentar su producción. Por ello, solicita este préstamo, para comprar sus plantaciones e incrementar sus ganancias, asimismo, vender comida en el puente cercano de su casa, el cual es muy concurrido y transitado.Nosotros podemos ayudarle a lograr sus proyectos como agricultora y como negociante.
texts.en:
Ever since she was young, Janet has grown coffee, an activity which requires a large investment and care. This task is not difficult for her as she already has a lot of experience. We find her working to dry the coffee in the patio of her house, so that soon it can be sold to the merchants that visit her community or taken to the city of La Merced. However, Janet has many household necessities for which she would like to increase her production, buy more coffee plants and if possible, buy some extra land in order to increase her production. For this, she is requesting a loan, to buy the seedlings and increase her earnings while at the same time sell food at a bridge near her house which is busy with a lot of traffic. We can help her reach her goals as a farmer and as a businesswoman.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase number of coffee plants as well as buy more land in order to expand production

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth C. T. has been a member of FINCA Perú for six years. She lives with her partner and their four children aged 16, 14, 8, and 1. Elizabeth sells grains that she hauls on a cart to numerous local fairs. Additionally, she makes children's clothing upon request.

With her loan of 1,000 soles ($350 USD), Elizabeth plans to invest in her business by purchasing wheat, corn, beans, soybeans, flaxseed, cheese, material for children's clothing, thread, and needles. She plans to use her income to help her children continue their education. She would also like to own her own home and a store where she can sell her products in a fixed place instead of having to travel.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her business

loans.name: Fortunata

texts.es: Hace varios años atrás, Fortunata  tuvo la idea de vender bebidas heladas en su domicilio, a pesar de tener ciertas limitaciones por no contar con un lugar propicio para la venta de cerveza, ella misma acondicionó un espacio libre sin mesas ni muebles, pero igual vende estos productos, espera que con el tiempo esta situación pueda mejorar y adquirir bienes útiles para su negocio.Los pobladores demandan su servicio por su amabilidad y buen trato, que es lo que resalta en su negocio, y es uno de los mejores de la zona.Por ello, Fortunata quiere tener un local propicio para la venta de cerveza y poder así mejorar su negocio y su condición económica.Es así, que solicita un préstamo para mejorar su local e incrementar la cantidad de cervezas.
texts.en:
A few years ago Fortunata had the idea of selling chilled beverages from her home. In spite of having certain limitations, such as not having a proper place to sell beer, she herself remodeled an open space, without tables or furniture, but where nevertheless she sells these products. She hopes that with time this situation will improve and she will be able to acquire useful goods for her business. The neighbors demand her service due to her friendliness and good customer service, which is what makes her business successful and one of the best in the area. Fortunate wants to have her own proper locale to sell beer and in this way be able to improve her business and her economic condition. So she is seeking a loan to improve her local and increase the quantity of beer.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Improve her business and increase the number of bottles of beer

loans.name: Mariela

texts.en:
Mariela C. G., 22 years old and living with her partner and their two children aged one and a half years and six months old, is a member of the community bank, Marcela. When her son was born six months ago, she temporarily closed her store in order to care for him. As time permits, she is currently helping her husband with his business of preparing and bottling refreshments in their home and then selling them in the local market.

She is requesting a loan to invest in products including bottles, liquids, cola, juices and passion fruits. She is saving right now so she can go back to her business when their children are older. She dreams of eventually improving that business.

loans.use: To invest in products including bottles, liquids, cola, juices and passion fruits.

loans.name: Berta

texts.en:
Berta L. N., 25, is a member of the community bank known as Minka. Currently studying in a two-year cosmetology program at San Cristobal de Huamanga University in Ayacucho, Peru, Berta will complete her degree in one year. To pay for school she works on Sundays as a telephone provider, one of many people paid to stand on the busy corners of Ayacucho to provide cell phones, "public phones," for the public.

Berta is requesting a loan to invest in her education and to purchase more phone cards for the cell phones. She dreams of finishing school and having her own boutique.

loans.use: To invest in her education and to purchase more phone cards for use in the cell phones.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco es una de las personas con las cuales se puede entablar una conversación placentera, gracias a esta cualidad pudimos saber que hace ya 6 años se dedica a trabajar en una carpintería, donde también elaboran cajones al por mayor y los venden a los comerciantes de fruta, quienes se sienten muy satisfechos por el trabajo de don Francisco, pues siempre entrega sus pedidos de manera responsable.  Esta actividad es muy buena, sin embargo, las necesidades también son muy amplias, debido a la falta de maquinaria adecuada para agilizar su producción, sumado a esto, las necesidades de su familia para solventar los gastos. Por ello, Francisco solicita un préstamo, para incrementar su producción y así aumentar los ingresos económicos en su hogar.
texts.en:
Francisco is one of the people with whom you can have a pleasant conversation, and thanks to this quality we known that for 6 years he has worked in carpentry, making crates at wholesale and selling them to fruit vendors who are very satisfied with Francisco’s work, as he always delivers his orders in a responsible manner. This work is very good, nevertheless, his needs are also many due to the lack of adequate machinery to improve his production and subsequently be able to meet his family’s expenses. Therefore, Francisco is asking for a loan to increase his production and thereby increase his household’s income.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase production of creates that he makes

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: Norma, desde siempre quiso tener un kiosco para la venta de diversos productos, gracias al trabajo de años y el esfuerzo de cada uno de los miembros de su familia logró conseguir abrir su tienda, en la cual le va muy bien y es muy amable con sus clientes, razón por la cual su negocio es el más concurrido de su localidad.Ella siempre ha teniendo habilidad para las ventas y sobre todo de conocer las necesidades de sus clientes para tratar de satisfacerlas. Por ello, requiere de la suma que solicita para la compra de productos y mercadería necesaria para ampliar su negocio y surtirlo con mejores y variados productos, ya que así sus ganancias serán mayores y solventará los gastos de su hogar.Esperamos que usted pueda ayudar a Norma con sus planes de negocio y que prontamente tenga un negocio próspero y consolidado.
texts.en:
Norma has always wanted to have a kiosk to sell all kinds of products, and thanks to years of hard work and the support of her family members she was able to open her store. Everything has gone very well and Norma is very warm to her customers, the reason why her store is the most visited in her neighborhood. She always has had the ability for sales and, above all, knows the needs of her clients and how to try and satisfy them. To do that, she is requesting a loan to purchase necessary products and supplies to grow her business and stock it with more and better merchandise, which will help increase her earnings and help her cover household expenses. We hope that you can help Norma with her plans so that she will quickly have a prosperous and stronger business.

Translated from Spanish by Marty Greenstein, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Stock her store with new and diverse merchandise

loans.name: Maximiliana

texts.es:
Maximiliana es socia del Banco Comunal La Kantuta.

Maximiliana es casada, tiene 45 años y 3 hijos, Maximiliana tiene una casa de material rustico en una la asociación magisterial, Maximiliana viaja 4 diferentes ferias de la región en donde vende ropa para grandes y pequeños, los días domingos vende en la feria de San Juan Bautista con la ayuda de sus hijos. La ropa los adquiere en la ciudad de Lima y en algunas oportunidades compra de los mayoristas de la ciudad de Ayacucho.

Maximiliana necesita un préstamo de 1600 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de chompas, blusas, pantalones. Maximiliana sueña con brindar una mejor educación de sus hijos, surtir con más productos y construir su casa con material noble.
texts.en:
Maximiliana is a member of La Kantuta Community Bank. She's 45 years old and married with three children. She lives in a house built of rustic materials in a magisterial association, and travels to four different regional markets to sell clothes of all sizes. On Sundays, she sells at the St. Jean the Baptist Market with the help of her kids. She acquires her clothing in Lima and sometimes buys from wholesalers in the city of Ayacucho.

Maximiliana is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of sweaters, blouses and pants. Her dream is to provide her children with a good education, stock her business with more products and build a home with quality materials.

Translated from Spanish by Marty Greenstein, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase sweaters, blouses, pants, etc.

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es: Emilio es agricultor, gracias a su empeño y dedicación a la agricultura puede brindar lo necesario a su pequeña hija.  Ahora se está dedicando al cultivo de maíz, prontamente  estará cosechando y nuevamente espera estar preparada para el cultivo de nuevos productos agrícolas, sin embargo para esto, requiere de mayor cantidad de abonos, para que sus plantas puedan desarrollarse adecuadamente y sus productos sean de calidad, para así venderlos a mejor precio en los mercados.Siendo así, Emilio solicita un préstamo de 1000 soles para incrementar su producción y mejorar sus productos, los cuales ayudarán a la siembra de otros productos agrícolas.Emilio espera de usted para consolidar sus planes de producción.
texts.en:
Emilio is a farmer. Thanks to his hard work and dedication, his farm can earn enough to support his small daughter. Emilio is currently growing corn, but after the upcoming harvest he hopes to be prepared to grow new products. In order to do this, Emilio needs a larger quantity of fertilizers so that his crops can develop adequately. He hopes to grow high quality crops so that he can sell them for a better price in the markets. For this reason, Emilio is asking for a loan of 1000 soles to increase his production and improve his products, the sales from which will fund the planting for a new cycle of crops. Emilio hopes that you can consolidate his production plans.

Translated from Spanish by Sarah Bishop, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase and improve agricultural production

loans.name: Javier

texts.es: Javier es un joven muchacho, que para ayudar a sus padres con los gastos familiares se puso a trabajar como agricultor, hasta el momento lo está realizando de la mejor manera. En su chacra ha sembrado lechuga y prontamente cosechará, las trasladarlas a los  mercados cercanos a su zona para venderlas y comenzar nuevamente sus cultivos de productos agrícolas de acuerdo a la temporada. Es por ello que solicita un préstamo para la compra de semillas para iniciar su cultivo, y abono para mantenerlos sanos, y así tener la posibilidad de ofertar a mejor precio sus  productos en el mercado. Esta en sus manos que este joven pueda seguir adelante como agricultor y tener la posibilidad seguir ayudando a sus padres y hermanos menores.
texts.en:
Javier is a young man who, in order to help his parents with household expenses, went to work as a farmer and so far is doing so to the best of his ability. On his farm he has planted lettuce and will soon harvest it, bring it to the nearby markets to sell and once again begin planting crops in accordance with the season. For this reason he is requesting a loan, to buy seeds to start planting and organic fertilizers to keep the crops healthy and in this way have the possibility of offering a better price for his products to the market. It is in your hands that this young man be able to continue as a farmer and have the possibility of continuing to help his parents and younger siblings.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy seeds and organic fertilizers for his fields.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luís es un hombre muy trabajador, que con mucho esmero sale todas las mañanas rumbo a sus terrenos de cultivo, junto a ello, cuida de sus vaquitas, las lleva todas las mañanas a alimentarse. Es así que demuestra mucha dedicación hacia sus vacas, ya que de una u otra manera le ayudan a solventar los gastos dentro de su hogar, porque desde muy temprano su esposa las ordeña y vende su leche por lugares cercanos.Más ahora Luís desea invertir en sus tierras, para producir mayor cantidad y trasladar sus productos a los mercados cercanos de la zona, con el fin de seguir creciendo económicamente. También, quiere comprar otra vaquita, para que su esposa pueda elaborar quesos y llevarlos a las ciudades para su venta, para eso requiere del préstamo que solicita, el cual le ayudará a comprar semillas y abonos, indispensables para sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Luís is a hard-working man who goes to cultivate his fields every morning with great care. Along with that, he tends to his calves, taking them to feed in the mornings. His work demonstrates his dedication to his cows, since one way or another they help solve his household expenses. Early in the morning his wife milks them and sells it at nearby places. Most recently, Luís wants to invest in his lands to yield larger quantities to transport to the area markets, helping his business to continue growing economically. He also wants to purchase another calf so that his wife can make cheeses and take them to the cities to sell. He is requesting a loan for these purposes, helping him purchase seeds and fertilizer, essential products for his crops.

Translated from Spanish by Marty Greenstein, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase seeds and fertilizer as well as another calf

loans.name: Sixto

texts.es: Desde hace más de 25 años, Sixto se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza de animales, los cuales vende sobre todo en las festividades de los poblados aledaños al suyo. Además cría vacas, a las cuales les tiene gran aprecio, ya que gracias a ellas puede de una u otra forma solventar los gastos diarios de su hogar, por la leche que vende temprano en la mañana.Sixto nos mostró a sus animalitos con mucha alegría, sus grandes vacas estaban a punto de ser vacunadas contra las diversas enfermedades que puede atacar a este tipo de animal. Para él es muy importante trabajar en la chacra y en la crianza de sus animales, por eso solicita un préstamo, para la compra de una vaca, con la cual su esposa pueda elaborar queso y venderlo en los mercados, y así tener un ingreso adicional en el hogar.Contamos con su apoyo para los proyectos de don Sixto.
texts.en:
For the past 25 years, Sixto has worked in agriculture and the raising of animals, which he sells mostly in festivals in villages close to his own. He also raises cows which he cares for greatly since thanks to them, he can cover his household expenses through the milk which he sells in the mornings. Sixto showed us his animals with great happiness as his cows were about to be vaccinated against the various sickness that affect that type of livestock. For Sixto, it is very important to work his land and raise his animals which is why he is currently seeking a loan in order to purchase another cow so that his wife can make cheese and sell it in the local markets. That will help his family to generate additional income. We appreciate your support for Don Sixto's projects.

Translated from Spanish by Scott Crandall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase one more cow in order to make cheese

loans.name: Eusebio

texts.es: Eusebio es un hombre muy optimista, a pesar de las circunstancias que le tocó atravesar, tiempo atrás, siendo minero, tuvo un fatídico accidente, que lo llevó gravemente herido al hospital, actualmente, superado ese momento, gracias a Dios, nos cuenta, las huellas de su accidente no le impiden seguir adelante, perdió su trabajo en la mina, pero ahora se dedica a la ganadería y a la agricultura, labores que le ayudan a solventar los gastos de su familia.  Es por ello que tiene gran aprecio a sus animales, los cuales ayudan considerablemente en la mantención de sus 2 hijos y sobre todo a que pueda llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar.   Es por ello que desea incrementar su ganado, y con ellos aumenta los ingresos a su hogar, espera que usted pueda ayudarlo, atendiendo su solicitud de préstamo.
texts.en:
Eusebio is a very optimistic man in spite of the circumstances he has endured. Some time ago, being a miner, he had a fateful accident that left him gravely injured and in the hospital. Today he has overcome this incident, thanks to God, he tells us, the traces of this accident don’t prevent him from being successful. He lost his job in the mine, but now he raises cattle and farms, work which helps them meet their family’s expenses. He has a great appreciation for animals, which help him considerably in supporting his 2 children and above all he can provide the daily bread for his home. He wishes to increase his cattle, and therefore increase his earnings. He hopes that you can help him by funding his loan application.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase the number of cattle he owns

loans.name: Javier

texts.es: Javier trabaja muy alegre en su chacra produciendo maíz, producto que por temporada  le viene ayudando a solventar los gastos de su hogar y las necesidades de sus 3 hijos, quienes son escolares y requieren de varios útiles para seguir estudiando.Su deseo como padre es darles lo necesario a sus pequeños para que ellos progresen a través del estudio y puedan dedicarse a otras actividades fuera de tareas de agricultor.  Es por esta forma de pensar que muchos lo consideran un padre abnegado y trabajador.  Sin embargo, ahora requiere de ayuda para continuar con su trabajo, necesita adquirir abono y fertilizantes, que son tan indispensables para lograr cosechar productos acorde a las exigencias del mercado.
texts.en:
Javier happily works on his small farm growing corn, a crop that when in season, helps him pay the household expenses and the necessities of his three children. His children are students and need various supplies to keep studying. He wishes as a father that he can give his children what they need so they can progress through school and later work at jobs other than those in the agricultural sector. In this way he thinks that many people consider him a hard-working and selfless father. Nonetheless, now he needs help in order to continue working. He needs to buy organic and chemical fertilizers, which are very important for growing products according to market demands.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy organic and chemical fertilizers for his farm

loans.name: Rolando

texts.es: Por el bienestar D. sus 7 hijos, Rolando trabaja arduamente en sus terrenos D. cultivo, lo  hayamos rumbo a su chacra en compañía D. su burrito, quien le ayuda a llevar las cargas  y las herramientas necesarias para trabajar en sus tierras.  Le es muy beneficioso tener animales D. carga, los que alivianan su carga, así como sus toros, que le ayudan en el arado para el comienzo D. sus sembríos.  En el transcurso D. estos meses a doblado su trabajo con el fin D. ayudar a su hijo quien  se encuentra muy mal D. salud y los médicos no han podido diagnosticar claramente  su enfermedad, lo que mantiene a L. familia preocupada y angustiada.  Ronaldo se mantienen sereno, consiente D. que su hijo tiene que tener varios exámenes, y conlleva gastos, por ello está duramente trabajando en su chacra para que después D. L. cosecha pueda vender sus productos y tenga dinero para poder llevar a su hijo a alguna ciudad cercana donD. puedan examinarlo adecuadamente.  Por ello, solicita un préstamo para L. compra D. fertilizantes y una fumigadora,  indispensable para desinfección D. sus chacras.
texts.en:
For the well-being of his seven children, Rolando works hard on his agricultural plots. He can often be found en route to his land alongsiD. his donkey who helps to carry his loads and the necessary tools to work the land. It is very beneficial for him to have beasts of burden to lighten his load; his oxen are very important to him as well, helping him to plow the earth before planting his seeds. In the last few months, he has doubled his work-load in order to help his son who is suffering from poor health. The doctors have not been able to clearly diagnosis his sickness which has his family very worried. Ronaldo helps to keep them calm, but knows that his son needs more tests which will cost a lot; that is why he is working hard on his land in order to have a good harvest, sell his crops, and be able to take his son to a nearby city where he can receive a proper medical exam. This is why Ronaldo is seeking a loan in order to purchase fertilizer and a fumigator, which is absolutely necessary to spray his crops.

Translated from Spanish by Scott Crandall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of fertilizer and a fumigator in order to spray his agricultural land

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa es una mujer que desde muy joven tuvo que afrontar sus limitaciones para poder caminar, debido a una fuerte caída que sufrió en su chacra, ahora camina cojeando.  Pero esto no impidió que siquiera adelante con su ritmo de vida, gracias a Dios, nos dice, ahora tiene una familia que le ayuda en todo.  Sin embargo, por su dificultad en caminar, se dedica a la crianza de vacas, por las que obtiene leche que vende dentro de su comunidad.  Ahora desea incrementar su negocio de venta de leche, pero sus nuevas terneritas aun están pequeñas, entonces tiene pensado adquirir una vaca más, pero no cuenta con el capital para hacerlo y solicita un préstamo de 1000 soles para la comprar de esta.   Ella espera que usted sea de las personas que pueda apoyarla para seguir adelante como madre y como trabajadora.
texts.en:
Rosa is a woman who, from a very young age, had to confront limitations to be able to walk. Because she suffered a sharp fall at her farm, she now walks a limp. But even that did not stop her from going forward with her pace of life. She thanks God that she now has a family who helps her with everything. However, because of her difficulty with walking, Rosa raises cows and sells the milk she collects within her community. She now wants to increase her business selling milk, but her new calves are still small. Therefore, Rosa plans to buy one more cow, but does not have the capital to do so. She requests a loan of 1,000 soles for this purchase. She hopes that there are people who can support this so that she can carry on as a mother and as a worker.

Translated from Spanish by Larissa Kravanja, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase an additional cow to sell its milk

loans.name: Marleni

texts.es: Marlene es una mujer muy empeñosa en su labor como agricultora, al igual como en su papel de madre, de su pequeña, la que la acompaña en sus labores dentro de su chacra, así no se  siente sola, se siente feliz por compartir momentos con su única hija, a quien adora con todo su corazón.  Es común en su comunidad dedicarse a la producción de lechuga, pero próximamente estará invirtiendo en nuevos sembríos, como el maíz. Pero esto no podrá realizarlo sola, por ello, solicita un préstamo que invertirá en la compra de abonos y demás herramientas útiles para su producción.  Ella espera que por este medio, pueda usted ayudarla a salir adelante en su producción, por el bienestar de los suyos y sobre todo por el de su pequeña hija, en quien está basado su esfuerzo.
texts.en:
Marlene is a very hard-working woman in her work as a farmer, as well as in her role as a mother. Her young daughter accompanies her to her work within her farm so that she is not left alone. Marlene is happy to share moments with her only daughter, whom she loves with all her heart. It is common in her community to produce lettuce, but she will soon invest in new crops such as corn. But Marlene cannot carry this out by herself, and for this reason, she seeks a loan that she will invest in the purchase of fertilizers and other useful tools for the production of these new crops. By this method she hopes that you can help her succeed in her production, for the well-being of her family, especially for her young daughter for whom she bases her work.

Translated from Spanish by Larissa Kravanja, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For the purchase of fertilizers and other useful tools for the production of new crops

loans.name: Amilcar

texts.es: Amilcar es un joven llevo de sueños y ambiciones como agricultor, gracias a las enseñanzas que tuvo de sus padres, hoy se está iniciando en esta tarea, pero hasta el momento lo está haciendo muy bien, logrado así independizarse, pero sin dejar de apoyar a sus padres y hermanos en los gastos del hogar.  Amilcar desea seguir creciendo y demostrar a todos lo jóvenes de su comunidad que a pesar de ser joven, sí se puede progresar, además de ser ejemplo para sus hermanos, y apoyarlos para que ellos puedan ser mejores cada día, para que puedan estudiar y lograr sus sueños y realizarse con éxito.  Para que pueda seguir apoyando a su familia necesita un préstamo, para comprar abono y fertilizantes necesarios para sus terrenos de cultivo, y seguir invirtiendo en la producción de lechuga, en la cual le va muy bien.
texts.en:
Amilcar is an ambitious young man who dreams of being a farmer. Thanks to what he's learned from his parents, he's well on his way to his dream. He's become independent but he still manages to help his parents, brothers and sisters with family expenses. Amilcar wants to continue growing and to show other young people in his community that, despite being young, it's possible to progress. Furthermore, he wants to set an example for his brothers and sisters and to help them so that they can be better and better by studying and fulfilling their dreams. In order to continue supporting his family, Amilcar needs a loan to buy the fertilizers necessary to cultivate his land and to continue investing in his lettuce crops.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy fertilizer for farming business.

loans.name: Atuganile

texts.en:
Mambo from Tanzania! This is 38-year-old Atuganile from Dar es Salaam. She is a divorced woman with two children, ages 15 and 24. Additionally, she is responsible for supporting two dependants because their parents do not take care of them. Since 2003, Atuganile has been selling traditional African. Her business is doing good. She works at the business for 12 hours per day, 7 days per week. Atuganile currently earns about $100 USD from her business. She is requesting a loan of $275 USD to buy traditional African cloth such as kanga and vitenge, which she hopes to sell for a profit. Atuganile thanks you for your support.

SELFINA has taken a lead role as a pioneer of micro-credit in Tanzania through Micro-Leasing. The organization is engaged in the economic empowerment of women in Tanzania through the provision of a leasing and leaseback microfinance facility. Customs and traditions in Tanzania make it difficult for women to own land and assets, thus they are termed non-creditworthy by financial institutions. This leads to poor financial support and poor access to basic needs and services for women with low incomes. One of the primary advantages of micro leasing is that is allows clients to use the equipment as collateral for future loans with SELFINA, thus enabling them to borrow larger sums in the future.

loans.use: To purchase cloth in bulk for her clothing store.

loans.name: Walter

texts.es: Walter es un noble agricultor, padre de 3 hijos, quienes son su adoración y el motor que le impulsa a salir adelante, con tal de verlos felices y sanos.  Es así que se levanta cada madrugada para salir a trabajar y pasar todo el día cuidando y abonando sus terrenos, por esa razón, encontramos solo a su esposa (en la foto) en su hogar y quien nos relata acerca del esfuerzo de su pareja por hacerlos felices. Ella también es una ayuda para Walter, porque gracias a la crianza de sus animales puede ayudar en la economía de su hogar, y sobre todo es quien está al pendiente del bienestar de su esposo y sus hijos.  Y nos comenta, que como familia desean progresar para atender las necesidades de educación de sus hijos, quienes están empezando una nueva etapa dentro de sus centro educativos, y ellos como padres desean poder ayudar a que sus hijos puedan lograr ser profesionales.  Por ello, están pensando sembrar nuevos productos y necesitan dinero para comprar semillas, es por eso que a través de este medio solicita que le puedan ayudar con un préstamo para concretizar sus planes de desarrollo.
texts.en:
Walter is a noble farmer and father of three children, whom he adores and who are the engine that drives him to succeed in order to see them happy and healthy. It is for this that that he gets up every morning to go out to work and spend all day caring for and fertilizing his land. For this reason, we only find his wife (pictured) in his home, who tells us about the efforts of her partner to make their family happy.

She is also a help to Walter; thanks to her raising their animals, she can help with the household expenses. Above all, she is the one who accounts for the welfare of her husband and their children. She also comments that, as a family, they wish to progress to meet the educational needs of their children, who are beginning a new stage in their educational center. As parents, they want to be able to help their children become professionals.

Therefore, they are considering planting new products but they need money to buy seeds. That is why through this medium Walter solicits someone who can help him with a loan to solidify his family’s development plans.

Translated from Spanish by Larissa Kravanja, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase and improve his agricultural production, with the purchase of new seeds.

loans.name: Eder

texts.es: Eder hace un año trabaja en sus terrenos agrícolas sembrando papa, maíz y arveja, productos que son muy buenos en esta temporada, por eso que aprovecha el momento para producir mayor cantidad y comercializarlos en los mercados.  Todo este trabajo está basado en el bienestar de su familia y sus padres, quienes al igual que él, son agricultores, ahora con la colaboración de sus hijos puede solventar los gastos de su hogar, y  también brindar un apoyo a sus padres, para que sus hermanos menores puedan estudiar.  Sin embargo, hay ciertos obstáculos que impiden que Eder pueda tener una producción adecuada, siendo la principal, los altos costos de los abonos y fertilizantes para sus terrenos de cultivo, esta es la razón por la cual solicita un préstamo, y espera que usted pueda ayudar a que siga trabajando y ayudando a sus padres para su bienestar.
texts.en:
For a year, Eder has worked in his agricultural lands growing potato, corn, and peas, products which are very good in this season. This is why he takes advantage of the moment to produce a higher quantity and sell them in the markets. All this work is based on the wellbeing of his family and his parents, who like him, are also farmers. Now, with the help of his children he can cover the household expenses, and at the same time offer support to his parents, so his younger siblings can study. However, there are some obstacles that prevent Eder from having an adequate production, the main being the high cost of fertilizers for his agricultural land. This is the reason he requests a loan and hopes you can help him keep working and helping his parents for their wellbeing.

Translated from Spanish by Eliana Colunga, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying fertilizer for her agricultural land.

loans.name: Arturo

texts.es: Arturo es un hombre muy trabajador y emprendedor que siempre trata de hacer las cosas mejor que antes y de mejorar día tras día, por ello, trabaja duramente en sus terrenos de cultivo donde pasa el mayor tiempo posible, brindándoles los cuidados necesarios y sobre todo de abonarlos y fumigarlos para prevenir diversas plagas que pueden afectar sus cultivos.  Es así que encontramos a su esposa (en la foto) en una chacra muy cercana a su hogar, quien nos comento del trabajo y desempeño de su pareja, a quien aprecia mucho y admira por su capacidad para consagrar su vida trabajando por su familia.  Arturo requiere de diversas herramientas, abonos y fertilizantes para seguir trabajando con el mismo ritmo, mejorar sus productos agrícolas para ser llevados a la capital para su comercialización. Para lo cual requiere de un préstamo, el cual solicita.
texts.en:
Arturo is a hard-working and enterprising man who constantly tries to do things better and to improve day after day. He works hard in his fields where he spends as much time as possible providing the necessary care, fertilizing his land and spraying to prevent diseases that might affect his yields. It's there that we find his wife (in the photo) in a field very close to her house. She told us about the work and responsibilities of her husband, a man that she appreciates and admires for the sacrifices he makes working for their family. Arturo needs tools and fertilizers to continue his difficult work, tending his crops so that they can be taken to the capital for sale. That's why he's applying for this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy tools and fertilizers for farming business.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es: Fernando es un noble trabajador que se dedica a la crianza de animales, sobre todo al ganado vacuno, los compra y vende en los mercados de las ciudades más comerciales.Esta actividad es muy agradable, porque el criar animales es lo que le agrada desde muy  pequeño, sin embargo, también tiene que ocuparse en otras actividades, y una de ellas es la de agricultor, cultiva papa y maíz en sus respectivas temporadas para cuidar que el mal tiempo pueda dañar sus productos.  Por esta razón, requiere de una cierta cantidad de dinero para trabajar sus terrenos de cultivo, el monto que necesita le ayudará a aumentar su producción y con ello, incrementar los ingresos económicos en su hogar, además de tener solvencia para seguir trabajando en sus chacras y en la compra y venta de animales.
texts.en:
Fernando is a noble worker dedicated to raising animals, primarily cattle, which he buys and sells in the most commercial city markets. This work is very agreeable to him, because raising animals is what he has enjoyed most since he was a young boy. Nevertheless he also has other jobs, and one of those is of farmer as he grows potato and corn in their respective seasons taking in to account the bad weather that could damage his products. For this reason, he requires a certain amount of money to work his land, his goal is to increase his product and thereby increase his household income in addition to being solvent in order to continue working on his farm and buying and selling animals.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase his capital to invest in preparing his land for growing crops

loans.name: Kumba

texts.en:
Kumba S. is a businesswoman in Kabala. She sells provisions, shirts, rubbers, jewelry, and more. She was born in Kabala 28 years ago. She is single and has two children, one in primary school and the other in nursery school.

This loan will be Kumba's fifth from SMT. Previous loans were a great blessing to this lady. They enabled her business to grow a great deal. Out of the proceeds she makes, she can feed and clothe herself, her children, and her parents. She is very thankful to Kiva for supporting her business.

Kumba is now requesting a loan of Le 3,500,000.00 to further strengthen her business. With this loan, she is sure that her income will definitely increase to a new height. With more profit, she will be able to do a lot of good things for herself as well continue to take good care of her aging parents, her children, and herself.

loans.use: Expand her business

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: Mario es un joven que  trabaja sembrado yerbas medicinales para llevarlas a las ciudades y venderlas, estas plantas son muy buscadas por ser altamente útiles para curar algunas dolencias, fiebres y males estomacales.  Es así, que ya hace un año está dedicado a la producción de estas yerbas, juntamente cultiva otros productos agrícolas en su chacra.  Este trabajo esta basado en el amor que siente por sus padres, desea ayudarlos a pagar los gastos educativos de sus hermanos, además de iniciar su independización, para más adelante formar su propia familia con su prometida quien es una joven muy trabajadora al igual que Mario.  Es por estas razones desea incrementar su producción, y dedicarse a la producción de productos más rentables, para ello requiere de un préstamo para iniciar la siembra de papa.  Tu contribución será importante para Mario, podrá no sólo ayudar a sus padres, sino que también podrá casarse con su pareja.
texts.en:
Mario is a young man who works planting medicinal herbs in order to take them to cities and sell them. These plants are highly sought after because they are very useful in curing certain ailments, fevers, and upset stomachs. For the past year, he has been producing these herbs along with cultivating other agricultural products grown on his farm. This work is based on the love he feels for his parents, and he wants to help them pay the educational expenses of his brothers. In addition, he wants to begin his own independence in order to start his own family with his fiancée, who is a hard-working young woman like Mario, in the future. It is for these reasons he wants to increase his production and to focus on producing more profitable products. In order to be able to do this, Mario needs a loan to start planting potatoes. Your contribution will be important for Mario; not only will it help his parents, but it would also enable Mario to marry his partner.

Translated from Spanish by Larissa Kravanja, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Investment capital to starting planting potatoes on his land, in order to help his parents and to get married soon.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.es: Elisa, a su corta edad, tuvo que asumir la responsabilidad de ser madre, sobre todo de solventar los gastos de su hija que ahora tiene 3 años, quien tiene muchas necesidades y Elisa trata de satisfacerlas.  Es así que trabaja en el campo produciendo papa, la cual es una de las actividades más cansadas, por las horas que se tiene que caminar para llegar a sus cultivos para luego fumigar y abonar sus productos, para que así, su cosecha tenga  productos mejorados y aceptables en los mercados. Elisa y su pareja tienen la ilusión de  tener su casa propia dejar la casa de su suegra, donde viven por el momento. Es por esto    que solicita este préstamo, para mantener sus productos adecuadamente y cosechar papas de alta calidad.
texts.en:
At her young age, Elisa had to assume the responsibility of being a mother, especially of covering the expenses of her daughter, who is now 3 years old and had many needs Elisa tries to satisfy. This is why she works in the fields producing potato, which is one of the most tiring activities because of the hours that she needs to walk to get to the fields to then fumigate and fertilize her products, so that in that way her crops have improved products that are acceptable in the markets. Elisa and her partner have the dream to have their own house and leave their moth-in-law's house, where they now live. This is why she requests this loan, to maintain her products adequately and grow high quality potatoes.

Translated from Spanish by Eliana Colunga, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: In vest in her potato crops, buying fertilizers.

loans.name: Justa

texts.es: Justa es una mujer que muy alegremente cría a animales vacunos para luego vender la carne en los mercados D. los pueblos.  Diariamente los lleva para que se alimenten con bueno y delicados pastos para que sus animales puedan desarrollarse correctamente.  Justa es una dulce pastora que vive  y mantiene su hogar gracias a sus animales.  Ahora  desea incrementar su ganado, sobre todo mejorar la raza D. sus carneros, para así vender la lana por kilos en las zonas textiles.  Por ello requiere un préstamo para la compra D. animales D. raza, y pronto tener un negocio D. venta D. lana, al igual que D. carne. Esperamos que usted pueda ayudarla a hacer esto posible.
texts.en:
Justa is a woman who very happily breeds cattle in order to later sell the meat in the town markets. Daily, she leads the cattle to be fed in a good and sensitive pasture so that they can properly develop. Justa is a gentle herder who lives and keeps her home thanks to her animals. Now, she would like to increase her livestock and, above all, improve the breed of her sheep in order to sell wool by the kilo in textile areas. In order to be able to do this, Justa requires a loan for the purchase of breed animals. She will soon have a business selling wool, similar to her business of selling meat. We hope you can help to make this possible.

Translated from Spanish by Larissa Kravanja, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of breed animals to improve the quality of her cattle and the quality of her sheep in order to sell their wool.

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.es: Marcelino junto a su esposa se dedican a la crianza de animales, los alimentan hasta que lleguen al peso adecuado y luego venden su carne en los mercados de las ciudades, actividad que es muy rentable, sobre todo en las fechas festivas, donde el precio tiende a subir por la demanda.  Durante el periodo de engorde, también se ocupan en el cultivo de productos agrícolas, en una pequeña chacra que poseen.  Marcelino y su pareja desean incrementar la cantidad de sus animales, para obtener mejores ganancias, e invertir en el sembrío de papa para el próximo año.  Por estos fines solicita un préstamo que le dará la oportunidad de lograr su objetivo, Marcelino  tiene muchas ilusiones de mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marcelino, together with his wife, breeds animals. They feed them until they reach the proper weight and then later sell their meat in the city markets. This is very profitable, especially during festive holidays where the price tends to rise by demand. During the fattening period, they also engage in the cultivation of agricultural products on a small farm they own. Marcelino and his partner want to increase the number of their animals, in order to obtain better profits, and also invest in the planting of potatoes next year. For these reasons, he solicits a loan that will give him the opportunity to achieve his goal. Marcelino has many visions of improving his quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Larissa Kravanja, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase the number of cattle and also to invest in the next crop of potatoes.

loans.name: Umaru J.

texts.en:
Umaru J. B. was born in Kabala. He is 38 years old. He is married to a business woman and they have three children: one in secondary school and two in primary school. He is a businessman in Kabala, selling cosmetics and pharmaceuticals.

Umaru previously received a loan of Le 2,000,000.00 from Kiva through SMT, a loan he repaid successfully. That loan helped him a lot by enabling him to increase the size of his business and the profit he makes.

Umaru is now seeking a loan of Le 3,500,000.00 to further improve his business. With this loan, he will travel to Freetown to buy more commodities at cheaper prices. In this way, he will be able to maximize his profit and improve his family's standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase more stock to expand his business

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es: Marlene es una alegre madre de familia, se dedica a la crianza de animales, aun tiene pocos porque es una actividad en la recién se inicia, espera poder aumentar pronto esta cantidad, además de esto, ayuda a su esposo en los campos de cultivo, es su ayuda idónea en todo tiempo.  Tiene un tierno corderito que cría en su casa, como mascota, es engreído en el hogar, y a quien su hijita menor ama y cuida.  Con el fin de ayudar a su pareja en los gastos del hogar es que decide dedicarse a la compra y venta de animales, este negocio que es muy rentable, la venta de la carne en los mercados incrementará sus ganancias económicas, para la compra de nuevos animales, es que solicita el presente préstamo.
texts.en:
Marlene is the happy Mother of a family, and she works raising animals. She only has a few as she has only recently started this activity and she hopes to increase the amount she has. As well as this, she helps her husband in agriculture, and he is her great help all the time. She has a lovely lamb that she raised in her house as a pet and it is it is a key part of their home and her daughter loves and looks after it. To be able to help her partner with the family's expenses she buys and sells animals. This is a very profitable business and selling the meat in the markets will increase her economic earnings so she can buy more animals and this is why she is asking for this loan.


Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase the amount of animals she has as she starts out as a farmer/Incrementar la cantidad de animales que posee, en su inicio como ganadera.

loans.name: Valentin

texts.es: Desde niño Valentín supo trabajar, sus padres le enseñaron a desempeñarse como agricultor, lo que aprendió muy bien, ya que ahora siendo padre de familia, sigue dedicándose a esto.  Gracias a sus padres, él tiene ahora la oportunidad de salir adelante en la agricultura, desea incrementar sus productos agrícolas, para brindarles a sus seres queridos una vida más prometedora.  A pesar de ser un buen agricultor y en hombre trabajador necesita de apoyo para salir adelante y mejorar su producción, por ello solicita un préstamo, para comprar  los abonos necesarios, los cuales están sumamente caros,  pero sin ellos su producción no sería la mejor. Usted puede ayudarlo a seguir  adelante con sus planes de  desarrollo.
texts.en:
Since he was a child Valentin has known to work. His parents taught him how to get by as an agriculturist, and he learned very well. Now that he is father of a family he still works as an agriculturalist. Thanks to his parents he now has the opportunity to move forward as a farmer, and he hopes to increase his agricultural products so that he can bring his loved ones a more promising life. Despite being a good agriculturalist and worker he needs help to move forward and improve his production. This is why he is asking for a loan, so that he can buy more of the fertilizers he needs, which are very expensive, but without them his production will not improve. You can help him keep moving forward with his development plans.


Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fertilizers so his agricultural production will be of good quality/Compra de abonos para que su producción agrícola sea de calidad.

loans.name: Oswaldo

texts.es: Oswaldo es un hombre de avanzada edad, a pesar de sus años, tiene la responsabilidad de  educar a sus hijos, sobre todo de solventar los gastos de primera necesidad en su hogar, ya que tiene una familia  numerosa.  Por ello trabaja arduamente en la  producción de sus terrenos,  en el cuidado sus productos agrícolas, y por ello que es muy conocido por su comunidad, por el empeño que le pone a su trabajo, lo cual lo caracteriza como uno de los hombres más responsables de la zona.  Sin embargo, necesita comprar una mochila fumigadora, que le ayude a cuidar sus productos agrícolas y obtener en la cosecha productos de buena calidad, en comparación con la competencia.Espera la ayudar necesaria para adquirir esta mochila fumigadora y así tener mayores cuidados con sus productos, evitando que sean perjudicados por las plagas.
texts.en:
Oswaldo is an older man, but despite his age he is responsible for his kids' education, and more than anything for all the household costs as he has a large family. This is why he works very hard in the field and in looking after his agricultural produce, and he is well known for this in his community - for the work that he puts into his job, and this is what characterizes him as one of the most responsible men in his area. However, he needs to buy a fumigating backpack which will help him to look after his agricultural products and to get good quality products from the harvest in comparison with the competition. He awaits the necessary help to get this fumigating backpack and thereby better look after his produce, avoiding them being damaged by pests.


Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a fumigating backpack to fight against the pests that threaten his produce/Compra de una mochila fumigadora para luchar contra las plagas que amenazan sus cultivos.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen es madre D. 4 hijos, por ellos pone todo su esfuerzo en su actividad como agricultora, trabaja incansablemente para brindarles una educación, ya que están próximos a terminar su estudios escolares y lo primordial para ella, es que sus hijos sean profesionales y puedan salir adelante.  Trabaja desD. muy temprano en sus tierras, donD. cultiva  diversos productos agrícolas, los cuales varían según la temporada D. sembrío, ahora espera tener la posibilidad D. incrementar su producción y sobre todo mejorar la calidad D. sus productos.  Con este fin solicita un préstamo que le servirá para la compra D. fertilizantes y abono para el cuidado D. sus terrenos.
texts.en:
Carmen is a mom of 4, and for her children she puts all her efforts into her activity as a farmer. She works tirelessly to offer them an education, because they are close to finishing their school studies and the priority for her is that her children become professionals so they can get ahead in life. She works since very early on her lands, where she grows diverse agricultural products which vary depending on the season. She now hopes to have the possibility to increase her production and especially to improve the quality of her products. To this end she requests a loan which she will use to buy fertilizers for the care of her plots of land.

Translated from Spanish by Eliana Colunga, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying fertilizer for her agricultural land.

loans.name: Alie

texts.en:
This is 58-year-old Alie S.. Alie was born in Fadugu but now lives with his family in Kabala. Alie is married to a businesswoman who sells second hand clothes. Alie and his wife have 15 children. Three are already married; seven are in secondary school and five in primary school. 

Alie was involved in a car accident some years ago. He lost one of his feet in the accident. When he recovered seven months later and resumed work, he developed a special interest and love for the war amputees. He encouraged them to stop begging in the streets and to join him in the tailoring profession. Today, he has about 13 amputees he is training for free in his tailoring shop. 

Alie is seeking a loan of Le 3,500,000.00 ($1200 USD) to buy himself working materials such as cotton, thread, and so forth. Presently, he is in short of sewing machines. Alie will like to buy more sewing machines for his trainees.

Previous loans were the main instrument for the current gains Alie has made in his business. Through his business and with the support of his wife, they are able to meet most of their family's immediate needs.

loans.use: Buy sewing supplies like cotton, sewing machines, and thread

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia es una mujer con mucho valor, sobre todo muy trabajadora, es agricultora, labor que le acompañó desde niña, con la cual sus padres pudieron educarla y velar por ella, ahora la historia se repite, tratando ella de dar lo necesario a sus 4 hijos.  Ahora que es casada desarrolla esta habilidad que adquirió hace varios años, para toda la vecindad es de las personas más dedicadas a sus labores y obligaciones tanto de agricultora como de madre.  Para seguir adelante tiene pensado acrecentar su producción, para consolidar este deseo Julia invertirá el dinero que solicita en la compra de herramientas y abonos, para el incremento de sus productos y para que estos puedan ser de mejor calidad, con esto podrá obtener mejores ganancias económicas cuando los venda en los mercados de sus alrededores.
texts.en:
Julia is a very valued woman, and more than anything she is a hard worker. She is an agriculturalist, a job that she learned as a child and with which her parents could educate her and watch over her. Now history is repeating itself and she is trying to give her 4 kids all they need. Now she is married she has developed this skill that she acquired as a child, and out of the whole community she is one of the people most dedicated to her labors and obligations as an agriculturalist and as a mother. To move forward she would like to increase her production and to consolidate this desire Julia will invest the money she has asked for in buying tools and fertilizers to increase her produce and so that they will be of a better quality. With this she will get better earnings when she sells in nearby markets.


Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy the fertilizers and tools necessary for her work as an agriculturalist/Compra de abono y herramientas necesarias para su labor como agricultora.

loans.name: Ercilio

texts.es: Ercilio es un hombre muy trabajador, dedicado a sus cultivos de habas y papa, situados en las lejanías de su comunidad, ya que son las más extensas, en cuales invirtió grandes  cantidades de dinero, con las ganas de cubrir las necesidades de sus pequeños hijos con las ganancias que le deje esta actividad.  Ercilio nos mostró su pequeño terreno, el más cercano, para ver su producción, sus anhelos como agricultor son de poseer grandes hectáreas de terreno, donde invertir dinero y con ello tener la posibilidad de acrecentar sus ingresos económicos por el bienestar de su familia.  Es así que envía su solicitud de préstamo para acrecentar sus  terrenos de cultivo, está en usted, colaborar con este buen agricultor.
texts.en:
Ercilio is a very hard worker, growing beans and potatoes. He's invested large amounts of money into his land, which is located far from his community because it is the largest tract. Ercilio invested in the land with the hope of farming to cover the necessities of his small children with his earnings. He showed us his small farm so that we could see his products. Ercilio hopes to own large hectares of land to invest in, and thereby have the possibility of increasing his income and the wellbeing of his family. This is why Ercilio is asking for a loan to increase his land, and it is up to you to collaborate with this good farmer.

Translated from Spanish by Sarah Bishop, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase his arable land, buying nearby tracts and wholesale seeds to plant

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan es un hombre muy trabajador y emprendedor, dedicado al cuidado de sus terrenos de cultivo y sobre todo de sus animales, a quienes les debe el pan de cada día, por ello trata de atenderlos de la mejor manera.  Juan es uno de los agricultores más dedicados, todas las mañanas lo ven pasar por las calles rumbo a su trabajo, es una de las personas más respetables de la zona, quien a sabido ser ejemplo para sus hijos y para los demás.  Esa valentía y ganas que le pone a su labor como agricultor, es lo que resalta en este hombre, consagrado a su familia y sus campos.  Sin embargo, tiene dificultades y problemas económicos que le están trayendo desniveles y pérdidas, por ello solicita  su apoyo con el préstamo de 1300 soles para incrementar su producción, y si es posible adquirir un toro.
texts.en:
Juan is a very hard-working and enterprising man who works cultivating his farmland and caring for his animals. It is to them that he owes his daily bread, so he tries to take care of them as best he can. Juan is one of the most dedicated farmers and every morning the town sees him walking to his work. He is one of the most respected people in the area and is known as an example for his children and the rest of the town. The courage and earnest he puts into his job as a farmer is what stands out in this man, devoted to his family and his farmland. Nonetheless, he has difficulties and financial problems that are bringing him irregularities and losses. For this reason he is requesting your help with a loan of 1300 soles ($450) to increase his production and also possibly buy a bull.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase crop production and buy another bull

loans.name: Abubakarr

texts.en:
Abubakarr, 29, was born in Kabala. He is single with no children. He owns a shop at the Kabala Main Lorry Park. His shop provides a dual purpose—he sells soft and hard drinks, water, and assorted goods in the front of the shop and inside, he provides computer classes for the local people.

Abubakarr has had polio, but he refused to become a beggar in the streets, as many other polio victims are doing in Sierra Leone. His dad could not continue paying his school fees when he reached Junior Secondary School (JSS) III.  So Abubakarr began selling a few items like biscuits, matches and cigarettes in a small tray. However, it was very difficult for him to grow from there. He then approached SMT when it began operating in Kabala in 2005. Today, he is very grateful to SMT. He told me: "SMT is my mother, father, and everything. Without SMT I am no where." 

With SMT's loans, his business began growing bit by bit. He re-enrolled in school and began paying the fees himself. He wrote his WASSE (West Africa Senior Schools Examination) and managed to make good grades. Then he enrolled in a diploma course at the Fatima Institute, Makeni. He has finished his two-year diploma course in Human Right and Good Governance and is now doing another two-year diploma in Development Studies.

Abubakar's business has grown enormously. Today, he has a generator, a refrigerator, and computers in his shop. With his shop, he is able to support himself well. But in the Sierra Leonean/African cultural matrix, he has the responsibility of taking care of his aged father, mother, and younger brothers as well as paying for his continuing education. 

Due to his hard work and his polio condition, Care has offered him a scholarship for his current two-year diploma course, but he has many other school expenses. He attends Fatima Institute in Makeni, about 90 miles from Kabala. He thus pays a Le 30,000.00 fare to and fro every week to attend school. In his business too, he faces some challenges especially with the computer school he has opened. He is in short supply of items like turners and copiers. But life is full of challenges he told me. The more income one has, the greater are his responsibilities.

loans.use: To buy business supplies

loans.name: Martha Sarita

texts.es:
La Sra. Martha desde hace dos años buscando la manera de apoyar con la economía de su casa, es por eso que emprendio su negocio y comenzó a comprar y vender bisutería de plata, vendía al principio por medio de catalogo hasta que logro hacerse de su propio muestrario, debido a lo bien que le ha ido ahora desea aumentar su inventario y poder obtener mayores ganancias.

Ella necesita un prestamo por US $150 que pagara en 3 meses para comprar mercancia y brindarle un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Con tu apoyo ella saldra adelante.
texts.en:
Mrs. Martha has been looking for a way to support the family's economy for the past two years. For this reason, she started her business of buying and selling silver jewelry. At first, she was doing catalogue sales until she was able to have her own sample collection. Since she has been doing quite well she wants to increase her inventory and to be able to obtain a bigger profit.

She needs a loan of $150, which will be repaid over a period of 3 months, to buy merchandise and to offer a better service to her clients. With your support she will be able to succeed.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy merchandise.

loans.name: Mariluz

texts.es: Mariluz desde hace varios años se dedica a la agricultura, gracias a los toros que posee  para el arado de sus terrenos, su trabajo se hace mas liviano, por eso cuida y pastea a estos animales con mucho cariño, con el fin de no perderlos.  Todas las mañanas se dirige con sus toros a sus terrenos de cultivo para abonarlos, fertilizarlos y fumigarlos, con la finalidad de que en la cosecha pueda obtener mejores productos que sean rentables en los diversos mercados de la ciudad.  Las dificultades de Mariluz es por la compra de  los  abonos y los diversos  materiales a utilizar en el cuidado de sus terrenos agrícolas, además de movilizar su carga a los diversos mercados para su venta, por ello solicita un préstamo que usará en la solución de estos inconvenientes.
texts.en:
For many years Mariluz has been an agriculturalist, and her work has been made lighter thanks to the bulls she has to plow her land, and this is why she looks after her animals and puts them to pasture with a lot of love, so that she won't lose them. Each morning she goes with her bulls to the fields to fertilize and fumigate them so that her harvest will achieve better produce that is more profitable in the various markets in the city. Mariluz' difficulties are in buying the fertilizers and different materials used in looking after her agricultural land as well as taking her produce to the different markets to sell, and this is why she would like a loan that she will use to solve these inconveniences.


Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for her produce and pay for the journey to take her products to the markets to sell/Compra de abonos y fertilizantes para sus cultivos, además de pagar el traslado de sus productos a los mercados para su comercialización.

loans.name: Yuder

texts.es: Yuder tiene 20 años, se gana la vida con la actividad que desarrolló desde niño junto a sus padres, la agricultura, gracias a sus habilidades y emprendimiento también se dedica a otras actividades, como la compra y venta de animales, para esto realiza diversos viajes a las ciudades más comerciales como Huancayo.  Es gracias a este actividad que Yuder puede ayudar a sus padres, quienes se sienten orgullosos de su hijo, quien a sabido, a su corta edad, salir adelante por iniciativa propia, pero como padres interesados en el bienestar de su hijo se mantienen a su lado para apoyarlo en lo que necesite.  A pesar de contar con personas buenas a su alrededor, Yuder requiere el apoyo de personas como usted quienes le puedan ayudar a seguir prosperando  en su actividad, por lo que  solicita este préstamo para solventar los gastos de su viaje, donde llevará a la venta sus animales y a la vez traerá los pedidos que tiene en su comunidad.Con nuestro apoyo Yuder podrá seguir siendo un joven tan trabajador.
texts.en:
Yuder is 20 years old and he earns a living in agriculture, an activity that he developed alongside his parents as a child. Thanks to his skills and industrious nature he also undertakes other activities, like buying and selling animals. For this he travels to various more commercial cities such as Huancayo. It is thanks to this activity that Yuder can help his parents, who are very proud of their son who has known from a young age how to move forward by his own initiative, although as parents who are interested in their son's wellbeing they support him in what he needs. Despite being able to count on the people around him Yuder needs support from people like you who can help him to keep on prospering in this activity. This is why he is asking for this loan so that he can pay for the costs of traveling to where he takes his animals and bring the orders of his community back. With our support Yuder will be able to keep being a young worker.


Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To pay for the costs of traveling to nearby cities to sell his animals/Solventar los gastos de su viaje a las ciudades cercanas para la comercialización de sus animales.

loans.name: Mila

texts.es: Mila es una madre muy abnegada, trata de estar al pendiente de sus 7 hijos, los cuales son aun muy pequeños y dependen de ella, por lo cual optó por criar animales en su casa, donde puede también, atender a sus hijos. Tiene la responsabilidad de atender a los más pequeñitos, por eso no puede ir a sus campos de cultivo, pero sí alimentar y cuidar a sus animales.  Los gastos de una numerosa familia son altos, por ello requiere aumentar sus animales y la producción de sus productos agrícolas, con este fin nos mostró sus tiernos animales que cría, entre ellos hermosos conejos, que son los más delicados y los que quiere incrementar, por lo que solicita este préstamo.  Con esto espera mejorar su economía, y con ellos solventar las necesidades de su numerosa familia.
texts.en:
Mila is a very self-sacrificing mother who is in charge of the care of seven children; they are all still very small and depend completely on her. This is why she chose to raise small animals in her home so that she could also continue to attend to the needs of her children. She still needs to take care of the smallest of her children so she does not have the chance to leave to the agricultural fields to work; however, she can feed and take care of the small animals. The costs of such a large family are very high, so Mila needs to increase the number of animals she raises and her production of agricultural products. She showed us the tender animals that she raises; among them beautiful rabbits which are the most delicate and specifically the ones she would like to increase; this is why she is seeking a loan. She hopes to improve her income in order to cover the needs of her large family.

Translated from Spanish by Scott Crandall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase the number of rabbits she raises

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita dependía del dinero que su marido llevara a la casa, ante la necesidad de ver que en ocasiones no les alcanzaba decidió comenzar a vender plata para tener una entrada extra de dinero, primero con los mismos clientes de su marido quien vende frutas y verduras; al ver lo bien que le estaba yendo se decidió comenzar a hacerlo ya como negocio y es así como desde hace 2 años ella apoya la economía de su hogar con los ingresos de su negocio.

Ella necesita un préstamo por US $150 que pagara en 3 meses para tener mayor variedad de mercancía y así poder aumentar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Margarita depended on the money that her husband was taking home. After seeing that sometimes it wasn't enough, she decided to started selling silver jewerly in order to have extra money. She was first selling to the same clients of her husband who sells fruit and vegetables. After realizing she was doing well, she decided to do this as a business. This is how she has been helping to support her family's economy with the income of her business for the past 2 years.

She needs a loan of $150, which will be repaid over a period of 3 months, to have a bigger variety and be able to increase her sales.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy merchandise.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
Mohamed K. was born in Magburaka about 46 years ago. The rebel war brought him to Kabala, and he has chosen Kabala as his place of settlement. Mohamed is married to a businesswoman and they have 6 children. Two of their children are in secondary schools and one is in primary school. The other three have left school and are learning trades.

Mohamed is the only baker in Kabala who makes what the locals refer to as "machine breads." However, some of the shops in Kabala sell flour that has already expired, and this leads to very poor quality bread. Mohamed is seeking a loan of Le 3,500,000.00 to enable him buy working materials such as flour, sugar, butter, oil, and firewood. With this loan, he will be able to travel to Freetown to buy the flour he needs. Buying from Freetown is cost effective and also safer.

Previous loans from Kiva through SMT have been very helpful to Mohamed. He can pay his children's school fees and feed himself and family out of the proceeds from his business. He has also bought a piece of land and is working to build a house on it. With the proceeds from this loan, his immediate challenge is to build himself a bakery so that he can stop renting.

loans.use: Buy flour and other bread ingredients, and build his own bakery

loans.name: Cleidi De Jesus

texts.es:
Cleidi es una mujer joven y emprendedora, que trabaja por las tardes cuidando niños en su casa, y disponía de tiempo en las mañanas para hacer alguna actividad para tener un dinero extra, una amiga le recomendó vender plata y decidio que esa era una buena opción para lograr obtener ingresos extras.

Ella necesita un préstamo por US $150 que pagara en 3 meses para tener mayor variedad de productos que ofrecer y así incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Cleidi is a young entrepreneuring woman who works in the afternoons taking care of children in her home, leaving her mornings to perform some activity to make extra money. A friend recommended that she sold silver and she decided that was a good option to obtain an extra income.

She needs a loan for US $150 that she will pay in 3 months to have a larger variety of products to offer, and in that way increase her sales.

Translated from Spanish by Eliana Colunga, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: comprar mercancia

loans.name: Esteban

texts.es: Esteban es un buen padre de familia, trabajador y empeñoso en sus labores como agricultor y en la crianza de sus animales, gracias a su hija los puede mantener alimentados  y cuidados, para después ser vendidos en las ferias de los pueblos, como también en los mercados de las ciudades cercanas, donde invierte más por los gastos del viaje, pero también sus ganancias son mayores por el alto costo de venta que consigue fuera.  Por eso Esteban y su hija se ocupan de alimentarlos adecuadamente para obtener mayores ganancias, sin embargo, ahora desea aumentar la cantidad de sus cuyes, y también comprar cerdos y gallinas, así en el futuro dedicarse sólo a la ganadería, que es una actividad más rentable que la agricultura.  Para comprar un cerdo y algunos cuyes, necesita la cantidad que solicita como préstamo, con la promesa de ser responsable y puntual con sus pagos.
texts.en:
Esteban is a good father, hard-working, and steadfast in his endeavors as a farmer and in the raising of animals. Thanks to his daughter’s assistance, he is able to care and feed the animals for sale later at both fairs and marketplaces in nearby towns. Traveling to nearby towns increases his costs, but that is offset by the higher asking price he gets there. For this reason Esteban and his daughter take care to feed them properly in order to bring in more profit. Nevertheless, they would now like to increase the number of guinea pigs, as well as buy pigs and chickens, so in the future they might go into animal husbandry full-time, as it is a more profitable business that agriculture. In order to buy a pig and some guinea pigs, he needs a loan in the amount he has requested, and promises to be responsible and prompt in repaying it.

Translated from Spanish by Joyce ., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of a pig and more guinea pigs to increase the number of animals he raises for sale

loans.name: Sharon Maria Patricia

texts.es:
Sharon se dedica a la venta de zapatos desde hace 2 años, se inicio en esta actividad por que una compañera vendía en el lugar donde laboraban, ella se retiro del lugar y muchas compañeras se quedaron sin su proveedora, entonces vio la posibilidad de emprender su negocio, invirtió sus ahorros en mercancía y poco a poco esta creciendo su negocio.

Ella necesita un préstamo por US $200 que pagara en 3 meses para tener mayor variedad de productos que ofrecer y así incrementar sus ventas. Con tu apoyo ella saldrá adelante.
texts.en:
Sharon has been selling shoes for 2 years. She started this activity because a partner who retired, was selling the products where they were working. A lot of other partners were left with out their provider. Then, she saw the possibility of starting her own business. She invested her savings in goods and little by little she is making the business grow.

She needs a loan of $200, which will be repaid over a period of 3 months, to have a bigger variety of products to offer and this way increase her sales. With your support she will be able to succeed.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy merchandise.

loans.name: Iris

texts.es: Iris es una mujer que se preocupa por el bienestar de los suyos, por ello trabaja duramente en sus cultivos de café, actividad que realiza por más de 20 años y con la cual solventa los gastos de su familia.  Esta actividad de agricultora le ha enseñado mucho y le brinda oportunidades día a día, Iris ha sabido aprovecharlas de la mejor manera,  mostrándose siempre como una de las mejores productoras de café en su localidad, es solicitada por los grandes comerciantes que vienen a trasladar productos de la selva hacia los mercados de la capital y de las ciudades más cercanas y comerciales.   Por ello es que desea seguir trabajando al mismo ritmo, trabajar con mayores cantidades de terrenos de cultivo para incrementar  su producción, esto le da posibilidades económicas y recursos para  sostener su hogar y educar a sus 3 hijos quienes aun son escolares, pero que a medida que van creciendo, van aumentando sus necesidades propias para su desarrollo.  Es por estos motivos que solicita un préstamo, con el cual podrá adquirir  plantaciones de café e incrementar su producción. EspeR. que usted pueda contribuir con el pedido de Iris.
texts.en:
Iris is a woman who cares about the welfare of her family and therefore works hard at raising coffee, an activity in which she has been involved for more than 20 years and which pays her family’s bills. Her involvement in agriculture has taught her a lot and every day presents her with opportunities that she has been able to maximize.
